name: Prison Break (Pedroleum)
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam in 48 hours.

All sound effects, art and code  was created within the time-frame, excluding the music.

As a convict, escape the Robot Prison using your wit and your handy chains!

Controls:

W/A/S/D - Movement

Left Click - Throw Chain

Right Click - Fly to Chain

Right Click (Hold) - Fly to chains sequentially

Middle Mouse - Return all chains

R - Restart level

E - examine/talk to
